markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- Any armor or weapon this glass prism is affixed to glows softly with shifting colored lights. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 35.
  • **Armor** ([light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) After you cast an [abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2) spell by activating the prism, you glow with dim light in a multitude of shimmering hues, shedding light like a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) and making you [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) until the end of your next turn.
  • **Weapon** After you cast an abjuration spell by activating the prism, your Strikes with the weapon gain the [_brilliant_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1043) property rune until the end of your next turn.
Radiant Prism **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Price** 8,600 gp --- Radiant Prism (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Price** 20,500 gp --- The concealment when affixed to armor lasts for 2 rounds, and the spell DC is 38. The damage from the _brilliant_ rune increases to 2d4 of each type. Radiant Prism (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 1.1 **Price** 64,000 gp --- The concealment when affixed to armor lasts for 2 rounds, and the spell DC is 43. The rune is _greater brilliant_, and its damage is 3d4 of each type.
name: Radiant Prism (Major)
